name: Sudipto Chandra
intro: Software Engineer. Experienced in web and desktop application development.
about: I like to do creative work that can challenge and test my abilities to its max. I love interactive systems with hearty interfaces (who doesn't!). That's why I aim is to achieve the maximum beauty and performance with minimum resource when implementing a system.

Professionally, I am a full-stack web developer. As a hobby, I have worked on several desktop applications. In future, I plan to work on mobile platforms. Also, I have a great interest in game development.

Time is limited for all of us. So I always try to savour the taste of things I like and care about. I love this stupid machine that answers to all my prayers, unconditionally. My greater goal in life is to leave behind a footprint that will shine upon the future generations.
